metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14871 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: The REENT_CHECK macro (see newlib/libc/include/sys/reent.h) as used by REENT_CHECK_TM, REENT_CHECK_MISC, REENT_CHECK_MP and other newlib macros in versions prior to 3.3.0, does not check for memory allocation problems when the DEBUG flag is unset (as is the case in production firmware builds).

criterions.comment: gcc-snapshot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
newlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
